executive_summary.one_liner: AI-powered document scanner that automatically detects sensitive information and classifies documents by risk level.

business_value.point: Prevents data leaks by identifying sensitive content before sharing
Reduces manual document review time by 80%+
Automatic regulatory compliance flagging (GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, SOX)
Routes findings to appropriate departments automatically
Creates audit trail of all document scans

risk_assessment.risk: No authentication - anyone with network access can use
Text files only - PDF/images not supported

executive_summary.recommendation: Suitable for internal evaluation and small team pilots only. For production deployment, upgrade to v1 Docker (small teams) or v2 Production (enterprise).

component.name: Backend API
component.purpose: REST API for document analysis, settings, incidents

component.name: Frontend UI
component.technology: React 18, Single HTML file with inline JS
component.purpose: Web interface for scanning, dashboard, settings

component.name: Data Storage
component.limitation: Not thread-safe, not suitable for high concurrency

data_flow.step: User uploads document or pastes text via Web UI
Frontend sends POST request to /api/analyze/text or /api/analyze/file
Backend validates request and extracts text content
Backend constructs analysis prompt with system instructions
Backend sends request to Claude API
Claude analyzes document and returns JSON assessment
Backend parses response, creates incident record

sensitivity_dimensions.dimension: SSN, passport numbers, driver's license, home addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, medical records, biometric data
Revenue figures, budget data, salary information, bank accounts, credit card numbers, financial forecasts, investment data
M&A plans, partnership negotiations, competitive analysis, product roadmaps, market strategies
Patents, trade secrets, source code, R&D data, proprietary algorithms
Attorney-client privileged communications, regulatory filings, audit reports, compliance documentation
Network diagrams, credentials, system configurations, vulnerability reports, security procedures
Performance reviews, disciplinary actions, termination records, compensation details, employee disputes

scoring_system.level: Public information, marketing materials, general announcements
Internal use, non-sensitive business data, routine communications
Highly restricted, severe impact if leaked, executive approval required

installation_steps.step: Configure API key in Settings page

configuration.setting: Anthropic API key for Claude access
Claude model to use for analysis

limitations_and_security.limitation: No authentication mechanism. All endpoints are publicly accessible. Anyone with network access can upload documents and view all results.
API key stored in plaintext JSON file. Could be exposed if filesystem accessed.
Only text-based files supported (TXT, CSV, JSON, etc.). No support for PDF, DOCX, images, or other binary formats.
Single instance only. No load balancing or horizontal scaling. JSON file storage not suitable for concurrent access.
HTTP only. No TLS/SSL encryption for data in transit.
Basic incident logging only. No comprehensive audit trail.
